title: disconnectOrderItem
description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to disconnect an existing order.

objectType.description: The type of the object, disconnectOrderItem.

orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to this order item.

quantity.description: The quantity for the order item.

action.description: The action to be taken for this order item (E.g. Install, Change).

sellerServiceOrEndpointId.description: One or more of the following Seller-assigned values may be included: OVC Identifier, EVC Identifier, UNI Identifier, ENNI Identifier.

buyerServiceOrEndpointId.description: One or more of the following Buyer-assigned values may be included: Buyer OVC Identifier, Buyer EVC Identifier, Buyer UNI Identifier, Buyer ENNI Identifier.
